com.parkingtycoon.controllers

Class CarQueuesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.BaseController
      • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.UpdatableController
        • com.parkingtycoon.controllers.CarQueuesController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntrancesController, ExitsController

    public abstract class CarQueuesController
extends UpdatableController
    This class is responsible for adding and sending cars to an appropriate queue.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<CarQueueModel> queues

      protected abstract boolean nextAction(CarModel car)
      This abstract method should try to give a car a new goal after it has waited long enough in the queue.
      void removeQueue(BuildingModel building)
      This method should be called when a queue is demolished.

    • Field Detail

      • queues

        protected java.util.ArrayList<CarQueueModel> queues

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarQueuesController

        public CarQueuesController()

    • Method Detail

      • addToQueue

        public boolean addToQueue(CarModel car)
        This method will try to find an appropriate queue for a given car. If a queue is found, then the car will be added and sent to that queue.
        Parameters:
        car - The car that is looking for a queue
        Returns:
        Whether or not a queue has been found

      • sendCarToQueue

        private boolean sendCarToQueue(CarQueueModel queue,
                               CarModel car)
        This method will actually send a car to a queue if a path can be found to it. If the car fails to arrive, then the car will try to find another queue, if that fails too, then the car will be send to the end of the world.
        Parameters:
        queue - The queue the car wants to drive to.
        car - The car that wants to drive to the queue.
        Returns:
        Whether or not a path was found to the queue.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method will look for the cars that are first in the queue. If a car has waited long enough, the abstract method nextAction(car) will be called.

      • nextAction

        protected abstract boolean nextAction(CarModel car)
        This abstract method should try to give a car a new goal after it has waited long enough in the queue.
        Parameters:
        car - The car that has waited long enough
        Returns:
        Whether or not a new action could be given

      • createViews

        protected void createViews(CarQueueModel queue,
                           java.lang.String type)

      • removeQueue

        public void removeQueue(BuildingModel building)
        This method should be called when a queue is demolished.
        Parameters:
        building - The queue that is demolished.
